front.title: Root Fix for the .US Top Level Domain

abstract.t: This document describes the 'Root Fix for the .US Top Level Domain'. Root Fix is a series of actions taken by the Open Root Server Confederation (ORSC) to prevent the destabilization of the DNS due to ICANN's introduction of colliding top level domains. This document describes the actions taken bythe ORSC to remedy the collateral damage that has been directly caused to the .US top level domain in non-ICANN root systems.
